| History                 = The Burning Sons were a motorcycle gang led by three "lords", which used to be in the drug business. [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]]'s friend [[Henry McLaury (Earth-616)|Horrorshow]], the most important lord, who used to be a meth addict who got cleaned up and took the gang out of the drug business. 

Ram another lord was secretly dealing drugs and murdered several members of the gang, making it look as if Horroshow's meth using [[Henry McLaury, Jr. (Earth-616)|son]], a drug dealing member of the [[New Saints (Earth-616)|New Saints]] was responsible. He wanted to replace Horrorshow and get the gang back into the drug business. 

Wolverine tracked down Horrorshow's son, and discovered that he had been supplying Ram with drugs. He also learned that he hated his father and thereby couldn't be "saved" therefore Wolverine told him to disappear and never come back. Wolverine told Horrorshow and the Burning Sons a lie, that his son was dead. He afterwards killed Ram, thereby preventing a gang war.{{r|Wolverine Vol 3 73|74}}
